thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1811
thread.title: Maureen

author: Maureen
title: Maureen
text: I visited Air Canada site to book a flight to Nigeria, but after more than four attempts and reoccurring problem with the website and after speaking with three different agents, I finally gave up and went on to google search where I found FlightHub. The experience was literally a click away and in no time I found the right date at the right amount and less time layover. I also trusted their website to book a hotel - fingers crossed - since we're talking about Nigeria here, I'll see how that turned out as this is the first time I have ever made online Nigerian hotel reservation.
